The telegram account is scamming at present. Their quoted link (https://0x41c21693e60fc1a5dbb7c50e54e7a6016aa44c99.xyz/Rrrrr/) wants to someone seed-code of Wallet address. issue.title: mangabuddy.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://mangabuddy.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmangabuddy.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @MajesticTurtles > While going through the popular, latest, top, etc. on the website, the cover image for the books do not load. When reading one, the images do not load even after refreshing the page. ### [NSFW] Screenshots
